quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: The Lord is nigh unto them that are of a broken heart; and saveth such as be of a contrite spirit.

quotes.text: Thou wilt keep him in perfect peace, whose mind is stayed on thee: because he trusteth in thee.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Thou wilt keep him in perfect peace, whose mind is stayed on thee: because he trusteth in thee.

quotes.text: He that dwelleth in the secret place of the most High shall abide under the shadow of the Almighty.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: He that dwelleth in the secret place of the most High shall abide under the shadow of the Almighty.

quotes.text: And we know that all things work together for good to them that love God, to them who are the called according to his purpose.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And we know that all things work together for good to them that love God, to them who are the called according to his purpose.

quotes.text: Delight thyself also in the Lord; and he shall give thee the desires of thine heart.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Delight thyself also in the Lord; and he shall give thee the desires of thine heart.

quotes.text: He giveth power to the faint; and to them that have no might he increaseth strength.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: He giveth power to the faint; and to them that have no might he increaseth strength.

quotes.text: Thou wilt show me the path of life: in thy presence is fulness of joy; at thy right hand there are pleasures for evermore.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Thou wilt show me the path of life: in thy presence is fulness of joy; at thy right hand there are pleasures for evermore.

quotes.text: Blessed is the man that trusteth in the Lord, and whose hope the Lord is.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Blessed is the man that trusteth in the Lord, and whose hope the Lord is.

quotes.text: The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.

quotes.text: Behold, God is my salvation; I will trust, and not be afraid: for the Lord Jehovah is my strength and my song; he also is become my salvation.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Behold, God is my salvation; I will trust, and not be afraid: for the Lord Jehovah is my strength and my song; he also is become my salvation.

quotes.text: The Lord is my strength and my shield; my heart trusted in him, and I am helped: therefore my heart greatly rejoiceth; and with my song will I praise him.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: The Lord is my strength and my shield; my heart trusted in him, and I am helped: therefore my heart greatly rejoiceth; and with my song will I praise him.

quotes.text: Nay, in all these things we are more than conquerors through him that loved us.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Nay, in all these things we are more than conquerors through him that loved us.

quotes.text: The Lord is my rock, and my fortress, and my deliverer; my God, my strength, in whom I will trust; my buckler, and the horn of my salvation, and my high tower.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: The Lord is my rock, and my fortress, and my deliverer; my God, my strength, in whom I will trust; my buckler, and the horn of my salvation, and my high tower.

quotes.text: For the mountains shall depart, and the hills be removed; but my kindness shall not depart from thee, neither shall the covenant of my peace be removed, saith the Lord that hath mercy on thee.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For the mountains shall depart, and the hills be removed; but my kindness shall not depart from thee, neither shall the covenant of my peace be removed, saith the Lord that hath mercy on thee.

quotes.text: Be of good courage, and he shall strengthen your heart, all ye that hope in the Lord.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Be of good courage, and he shall strengthen your heart, all ye that hope in the Lord.

quotes.text: For our light affliction, which is but for a moment, worketh for us a far more exceeding and eternal weight of glory.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For our light affliction, which is but for a moment, worketh for us a far more exceeding and eternal weight of glory.

quotes.text: My soul, wait thou only upon God; for my expectation is from him.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: My soul, wait thou only upon God; for my expectation is from him.

quotes.text: To appoint unto them that mourn in Zion, to give unto them beauty for ashes, the oil of joy for mourning, the garment of praise for the spirit of heaviness.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: To appoint unto them that mourn in Zion, to give unto them beauty for ashes, the oil of joy for mourning, the garment of praise for the spirit of heaviness.

quotes.text: In the day when I cried thou answeredst me, and strengthenedst me with strength in my soul.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: In the day when I cried thou answeredst me, and strengthenedst me with strength in my soul.

quotes.text: For whatsoever things were written aforetime were written for our learning, that we through patience and comfort of the scriptures might have hope.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For whatsoever things were written aforetime were written for our learning, that we through patience and comfort of the scriptures might have hope.

quotes.text: Thou art my hiding place and my shield: I hope in thy word.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Thou art my hiding place and my shield: I hope in thy word.

quotes.text: He will swallow up death in victory; and the Lord God will wipe away tears from off all faces.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: He will swallow up death in victory; and the Lord God will wipe away tears from off all faces.

quotes.text: Commit thy way unto the Lord; trust also in him; and he shall bring it to pass.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Commit thy way unto the Lord; trust also in him; and he shall bring it to pass.

quotes.text: What shall we then say to these things? If God be for us, who can be against us?
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: What shall we then say to these things? If God be for us, who can be against us?

quotes.text: The Lord is my light and my salvation; whom shall I fear? the Lord is the strength of my life; of whom shall I be afraid?
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: The Lord is my light and my salvation; whom shall I fear? the Lord is the strength of my life; of whom shall I be afraid?

quotes.text: The grass withereth, the flower fadeth: but the word of our God shall stand for ever.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: The grass withereth, the flower fadeth: but the word of our God shall stand for ever.

quotes.text: Rest in the Lord, and wait patiently for him: fret not thyself because of him who prospereth in his way.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Rest in the Lord, and wait patiently for him: fret not thyself because of him who prospereth in his way.

quotes.text: For I am persuaded, that neither death, nor life, nor angels, nor principalities, nor powers, nor things present, nor things to come.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For I am persuaded, that neither death, nor life, nor angels, nor principalities, nor powers, nor things present, nor things to come.

quotes.text: O taste and see that the Lord is good: blessed is the man that trusteth in him.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: O taste and see that the Lord is good: blessed is the man that trusteth in him.

quotes.text: Trust ye in the Lord for ever: for in the Lord Jehovah is everlasting strength.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Trust ye in the Lord for ever: for in the Lord Jehovah is everlasting strength.

quotes.text: The steps of a good man are ordered by the Lord: and he delighteth in his way.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: The steps of a good man are ordered by the Lord: and he delighteth in his way.

quotes.text: Nor height, nor depth, nor any other creature, shall be able to separate us from the love of God, which is in Christ Jesus our Lord.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Nor height, nor depth, nor any other creature, shall be able to separate us from the love of God, which is in Christ Jesus our Lord.

quotes.text: He shall cover thee with his feathers, and under his wings shalt thou trust: his truth shall be thy shield and buckler.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: He shall cover thee with his feathers, and under his wings shalt thou trust: his truth shall be thy shield and buckler.

quotes.text: But now thus saith the Lord that created thee, O Jacob, and he that formed thee, O Israel, Fear not: for I have redeemed thee, I have called thee by thy name; thou art mine.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: But now thus saith the Lord that created thee, O Jacob, and he that formed thee, O Israel, Fear not: for I have redeemed thee, I have called thee by thy name; thou art mine.

quotes.text: I have been young, and now am old; yet have I not seen the righteous forsaken, nor his seed begging bread.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: I have been young, and now am old; yet have I not seen the righteous forsaken, nor his seed begging bread.

quotes.text: He that spared not his own Son, but delivered him up for us all, how shall he not with him also freely give us all things?
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: He that spared not his own Son, but delivered him up for us all, how shall he not with him also freely give us all things?

quotes.text: Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil: for thou art with me; thy rod and thy staff they comfort me.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil: for thou art with me; thy rod and thy staff they comfort me.

quotes.text: For I the Lord thy God will hold thy right hand, saying unto thee, Fear not; I will help thee.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For I the Lord thy God will hold thy right hand, saying unto thee, Fear not; I will help thee.

quotes.text: But the salvation of the righteous is of the Lord: he is their strength in the time of trouble.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: But the salvation of the righteous is of the Lord: he is their strength in the time of trouble.

quotes.text: Who shall separate us from the love of Christ? shall tribulation, or distress, or persecution, or famine, or nakedness, or peril, or sword?
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Who shall separate us from the love of Christ? shall tribulation, or distress, or persecution, or famine, or nakedness, or peril, or sword?

quotes.text: Peace I leave with you, my peace I give unto you: not as the world giveth, give I unto you. Let not your heart be troubled, neither let it be afraid.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Peace I leave with you, my peace I give unto you: not as the world giveth, give I unto you. Let not your heart be troubled, neither let it be afraid.

quotes.text: And the peace of God, which passeth all understanding, shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And the peace of God, which passeth all understanding, shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus.

quotes.text: He maketh me to lie down in green pastures: he leadeth me beside the still waters.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: He maketh me to lie down in green pastures: he leadeth me beside the still waters.

quotes.text: Behold the fowls of the air: for they sow not, neither do they reap, nor gather into barns; yet your heavenly Father feedeth them. Are ye not much better than they?
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Behold the fowls of the air: for they sow not, neither do they reap, nor gather into barns; yet your heavenly Father feedeth them. Are ye not much better than they?

quotes.text: I will both lay me down in peace, and sleep: for thou, Lord, only makest me dwell in safety.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: I will both lay me down in peace, and sleep: for thou, Lord, only makest me dwell in safety.

quotes.text: The Lord will give strength unto his people; the Lord will bless his people with peace.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: The Lord will give strength unto his people; the Lord will bless his people with peace.

quotes.text: Take my yoke upon you, and learn of me; for I am meek and lowly in heart: and ye shall find rest unto your souls.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Take my yoke upon you, and learn of me; for I am meek and lowly in heart: and ye shall find rest unto your souls.

quotes.text: But the meek shall inherit the earth; and shall delight themselves in the abundance of peace.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: But the meek shall inherit the earth; and shall delight themselves in the abundance of peace.

quotes.text: And the work of righteousness shall be peace; and the effect of righteousness quietness and assurance for ever.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And the work of righteousness shall be peace; and the effect of righteousness quietness and assurance for ever.

quotes.text: I will hear what God the Lord will speak: for he will speak peace unto his people, and to his saints.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: I will hear what God the Lord will speak: for he will speak peace unto his people, and to his saints.

quotes.text: These things I have spoken unto you, that in me ye might have peace. In the world ye shall have tribulation: but be of good cheer; I have overcome the world.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: These things I have spoken unto you, that in me ye might have peace. In the world ye shall have tribulation: but be of good cheer; I have overcome the world.

quotes.text: Great peace have they which love thy law: and nothing shall offend them.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Great peace have they which love thy law: and nothing shall offend them.

quotes.text: And all thy children shall be taught of the Lord; and great shall be the peace of thy children.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And all thy children shall be taught of the Lord; and great shall be the peace of thy children.

quotes.text: Depart from evil, and do good; seek peace, and pursue it.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Depart from evil, and do good; seek peace, and pursue it.

quotes.text: Therefore being justified by faith, we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Therefore being justified by faith, we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ.

quotes.text: Mark the perfect man, and behold the upright: for the end of that man is peace.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Mark the perfect man, and behold the upright: for the end of that man is peace.

quotes.text: He shall enter into peace: they shall rest in their beds, each one walking in his uprightness.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: He shall enter into peace: they shall rest in their beds, each one walking in his uprightness.

quotes.text: In his days shall the righteous flourish; and abundance of peace so long as the moon endureth.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: In his days shall the righteous flourish; and abundance of peace so long as the moon endureth.

quotes.text: For the kingdom of God is not meat and drink; but righteousness, and peace, and joy in the Holy Ghost.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For the kingdom of God is not meat and drink; but righteousness, and peace, and joy in the Holy Ghost.

quotes.text: Mercy and truth are met together; righteousness and peace have kissed each other.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Mercy and truth are met together; righteousness and peace have kissed each other.

quotes.text: Let my soul live, and it shall praise thee; and let thy judgments help me.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Let my soul live, and it shall praise thee; and let thy judgments help me.

quotes.text: Trust in the Lord, and do good; so shalt thou dwell in the land, and verily thou shalt be fed.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Trust in the Lord, and do good; so shalt thou dwell in the land, and verily thou shalt be fed.

quotes.text: O that thou hadst hearkened to my commandments! then had thy peace been as a river, and thy righteousness as the waves of the sea.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: O that thou hadst hearkened to my commandments! then had thy peace been as a river, and thy righteousness as the waves of the sea.

quotes.text: For to be carnally minded is death; but to be spiritually minded is life and peace.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For to be carnally minded is death; but to be spiritually minded is life and peace.

quotes.text: Lord, thou wilt ordain peace for us: for thou also hast wrought all our works in us.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Lord, thou wilt ordain peace for us: for thou also hast wrought all our works in us.

quotes.text: Uphold me according unto thy word, that I may live: and let me not be ashamed of my hope.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Uphold me according unto thy word, that I may live: and let me not be ashamed of my hope.

quotes.text: If it be possible, as much as lieth in you, live peaceably with all men.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: If it be possible, as much as lieth in you, live peaceably with all men.

quotes.text: And he shall bring forth thy righteousness as the light, and thy judgment as the noonday.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And he shall bring forth thy righteousness as the light, and thy judgment as the noonday.

quotes.text: For ye shall go out with joy, and be led forth with peace: the mountains and the hills shall break forth before you into singing.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For ye shall go out with joy, and be led forth with peace: the mountains and the hills shall break forth before you into singing.

quotes.text: Now the God of peace be with you all. Amen.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Now the God of peace be with you all. Amen.

quotes.text: I create the fruit of the lips; Peace, peace to him that is far off, and to him that is near, saith the Lord; and I will heal him.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: I create the fruit of the lips; Peace, peace to him that is far off, and to him that is near, saith the Lord; and I will heal him.

quotes.text: And the God of peace shall bruise Satan under your feet shortly. The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you. Amen.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And the God of peace shall bruise Satan under your feet shortly. The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you. Amen.

quotes.text: Charity suffereth long, and is kind; charity envieth not; charity vaunteth not itself, is not puffed up.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Charity suffereth long, and is kind; charity envieth not; charity vaunteth not itself, is not puffed up.

quotes.text: Beareth all things, believeth all things, hopeth all things, endureth all things.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Beareth all things, believeth all things, hopeth all things, endureth all things.

quotes.text: This is my commandment, That ye love one another, as I have loved you.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: This is my commandment, That ye love one another, as I have loved you.

quotes.text: We love him, because he first loved us.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: We love him, because he first loved us.

quotes.text: Be kindly affectioned one to another with brotherly love; in honour preferring one another.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Be kindly affectioned one to another with brotherly love; in honour preferring one another.

quotes.text: And be ye kind one to another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another, even as God for Christ's sake hath forgiven you.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And be ye kind one to another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another, even as God for Christ's sake hath forgiven you.

quotes.text: A friend loveth at all times, and a brother is born for adversity.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: A friend loveth at all times, and a brother is born for adversity.

quotes.text: And above all things have fervent charity among yourselves: for charity shall cover the multitude of sins.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And above all things have fervent charity among yourselves: for charity shall cover the multitude of sins.

quotes.text: And above all these things put on charity, which is the bond of perfectness.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And above all these things put on charity, which is the bond of perfectness.

quotes.text: Beloved, let us love one another: for love is of God; and every one that loveth is born of God, and knoweth God.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Beloved, let us love one another: for love is of God; and every one that loveth is born of God, and knoweth God.

quotes.text: A new commandment I give unto you, That ye love one another; as I have loved you, that ye also love one another.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: A new commandment I give unto you, That ye love one another; as I have loved you, that ye also love one another.

quotes.text: He that loveth not knoweth not God; for God is love.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: He that loveth not knoweth not God; for God is love.

quotes.text: Owe no man any thing, but to love one another: for he that loveth another hath fulfilled the law.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Owe no man any thing, but to love one another: for he that loveth another hath fulfilled the law.

quotes.text: And we have known and believed the love that God hath to us. God is love; and he that dwelleth in love dwelleth in God, and God in him.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And we have known and believed the love that God hath to us. God is love; and he that dwelleth in love dwelleth in God, and God in him.

quotes.text: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith.

quotes.text: Beloved, if God so loved us, we ought also to love one another.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Beloved, if God so loved us, we ought also to love one another.

quotes.text: But God commendeth his love toward us, in that, while we were yet sinners, Christ died for us.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: But God commendeth his love toward us, in that, while we were yet sinners, Christ died for us.

quotes.text: Herein is love, not that we loved God, but that he loved us, and sent his Son to be the propitiation for our sins.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Herein is love, not that we loved God, but that he loved us, and sent his Son to be the propitiation for our sins.

quotes.text: And walk in love, as Christ also hath loved us, and hath given himself for us an offering and a sacrifice to God for a sweetsmelling savour.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And walk in love, as Christ also hath loved us, and hath given himself for us an offering and a sacrifice to God for a sweetsmelling savour.

quotes.text: There is no fear in love; but perfect love casteth out fear: because fear hath torment. He that feareth is not made perfect in love.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: There is no fear in love; but perfect love casteth out fear: because fear hath torment. He that feareth is not made perfect in love.

quotes.text: For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.

quotes.text: No man hath seen God at any time. If we love one another, God dwelleth in us, and his love is perfected in us.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: No man hath seen God at any time. If we love one another, God dwelleth in us, and his love is perfected in us.

quotes.text: In this was manifested the love of God toward us, because that God sent his only begotten Son into the world, that we might live through him.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: In this was manifested the love of God toward us, because that God sent his only begotten Son into the world, that we might live through him.

quotes.text: And to know the love of Christ, which passeth knowledge, that ye might be filled with all the fulness of God.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And to know the love of Christ, which passeth knowledge, that ye might be filled with all the fulness of God.

quotes.text: If a man say, I love God, and hateth his brother, he is a liar: for he that loveth not his brother whom he hath seen, how can he love God whom he hath not seen?
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: If a man say, I love God, and hateth his brother, he is a liar: for he that loveth not his brother whom he hath seen, how can he love God whom he hath not seen?

quotes.text: And this commandment have we from him, That he who loveth God love his brother also.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And this commandment have we from him, That he who loveth God love his brother also.

quotes.text: But God, who is rich in mercy, for his great love wherewith he loved us.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: But God, who is rich in mercy, for his great love wherewith he loved us.

quotes.text: Hereby perceive we the love of God, because he laid down his life for us: and we ought to lay down our lives for the brethren.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Hereby perceive we the love of God, because he laid down his life for us: and we ought to lay down our lives for the brethren.

quotes.text: My little children, let us not love in word, neither in tongue; but in deed and in truth.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: My little children, let us not love in word, neither in tongue; but in deed and in truth.

quotes.text: Husbands, love your wives, even as Christ also loved the church, and gave himself for it.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Husbands, love your wives, even as Christ also loved the church, and gave himself for it.

quotes.text: Behold, what manner of love the Father hath bestowed upon us, that we should be called the sons of God: therefore the world knoweth us not, because it knew him not.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Behold, what manner of love the Father hath bestowed upon us, that we should be called the sons of God: therefore the world knoweth us not, because it knew him not.

quotes.text: For this is the message that ye heard from the beginning, that we should love one another.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For this is the message that ye heard from the beginning, that we should love one another.

quotes.text: So ought men to love their wives as their own bodies. He that loveth his wife loveth himself.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: So ought men to love their wives as their own bodies. He that loveth his wife loveth himself.

quotes.text: We know that we have passed from death unto life, because we love the brethren. He that loveth not his brother abideth in death.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: We know that we have passed from death unto life, because we love the brethren. He that loveth not his brother abideth in death.

quotes.text: But whoso hath this world's good, and seeth his brother have need, and shutteth up his bowels of compassion from him, how dwelleth the love of God in him?
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: But whoso hath this world's good, and seeth his brother have need, and shutteth up his bowels of compassion from him, how dwelleth the love of God in him?

quotes.text: Nevertheless let every one of you in particular so love his wife even as himself; and the wife see that she reverence her husband.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Nevertheless let every one of you in particular so love his wife even as himself; and the wife see that she reverence her husband.

quotes.text: And this is his commandment, That we should believe on the name of his Son Jesus Christ, and love one another, as he gave us commandment.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And this is his commandment, That we should believe on the name of his Son Jesus Christ, and love one another, as he gave us commandment.

quotes.text: And Jesus answering saith unto them, Have faith in God.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And Jesus answering saith unto them, Have faith in God.

quotes.text: But without faith it is impossible to please him: for he that cometh to God must believe that he is, and that he is a rewarder of them that diligently seek him.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: But without faith it is impossible to please him: for he that cometh to God must believe that he is, and that he is a rewarder of them that diligently seek him.

quotes.text: Trust in the Lord with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Trust in the Lord with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding.

quotes.text: What time I am afraid, I will trust in thee.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: What time I am afraid, I will trust in thee.

quotes.text: The Lord is good, a strong hold in the day of trouble; and he knoweth them that trust in him.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: The Lord is good, a strong hold in the day of trouble; and he knoweth them that trust in him.

quotes.text: And they that know thy name will put their trust in thee: for thou, Lord, hast not forsaken them that seek thee.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And they that know thy name will put their trust in thee: for thou, Lord, hast not forsaken them that seek thee.

quotes.text: The fear of man bringeth a snare: but whoso putteth his trust in the Lord shall be safe.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: The fear of man bringeth a snare: but whoso putteth his trust in the Lord shall be safe.

quotes.text: Trust in him at all times; ye people, pour out your heart before him: God is a refuge for us. Selah.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Trust in him at all times; ye people, pour out your heart before him: God is a refuge for us. Selah.

quotes.text: So then faith cometh by hearing, and hearing by the word of God.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: So then faith cometh by hearing, and hearing by the word of God.

quotes.text: Blessed is that man that maketh the Lord his trust, and respecteth not the proud, nor such as turn aside to lies.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Blessed is that man that maketh the Lord his trust, and respecteth not the proud, nor such as turn aside to lies.

quotes.text: I will say of the Lord, He is my refuge and my fortress: my God; in him will I trust.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: I will say of the Lord, He is my refuge and my fortress: my God; in him will I trust.

quotes.text: For by grace are ye saved through faith; and that not of yourselves: it is the gift of God.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For by grace are ye saved through faith; and that not of yourselves: it is the gift of God.

quotes.text: Ye that fear the Lord, trust in the Lord: he is their help and their shield.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Ye that fear the Lord, trust in the Lord: he is their help and their shield.

quotes.text: Even so faith, if it hath not works, is dead, being alone.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Even so faith, if it hath not works, is dead, being alone.

quotes.text: It is better to trust in the Lord than to put confidence in man.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: It is better to trust in the Lord than to put confidence in man.

quotes.text: By faith Noah, being warned of God of things not seen as yet, moved with fear, prepared an ark to the saving of his house.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: By faith Noah, being warned of God of things not seen as yet, moved with fear, prepared an ark to the saving of his house.

quotes.text: They that trust in the Lord shall be as mount Zion, which cannot be removed, but abideth for ever.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: They that trust in the Lord shall be as mount Zion, which cannot be removed, but abideth for ever.

quotes.text: He staggered not at the promise of God through unbelief; but was strong in faith, giving glory to God.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: He staggered not at the promise of God through unbelief; but was strong in faith, giving glory to God.

quotes.text: Put not your trust in princes, nor in the son of man, in whom there is no help.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Put not your trust in princes, nor in the son of man, in whom there is no help.

quotes.text: By faith Abraham, when he was called to go out into a place which he should after receive for an inheritance, obeyed; and he went out, not knowing whither he went.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: By faith Abraham, when he was called to go out into a place which he should after receive for an inheritance, obeyed; and he went out, not knowing whither he went.

quotes.text: And being fully persuaded that, what he had promised, he was able also to perform.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And being fully persuaded that, what he had promised, he was able also to perform.

quotes.text: By faith he sojourned in the land of promise, as in a strange country, dwelling in tabernacles with Isaac and Jacob, the heirs with him of the same promise.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: By faith he sojourned in the land of promise, as in a strange country, dwelling in tabernacles with Isaac and Jacob, the heirs with him of the same promise.

quotes.text: In all thy ways acknowledge him, and he shall direct thy paths.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: In all thy ways acknowledge him, and he shall direct thy paths.

quotes.text: And therefore it was imputed to him for righteousness.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And therefore it was imputed to him for righteousness.

quotes.text: For he looked for a city which hath foundations, whose builder and maker is God.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For he looked for a city which hath foundations, whose builder and maker is God.

quotes.text: He that handleth a matter wisely shall find good: and whoso trusteth in the Lord, happy is he.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: He that handleth a matter wisely shall find good: and whoso trusteth in the Lord, happy is he.

quotes.text: Now it was not written for his sake alone, that it was imputed to him.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Now it was not written for his sake alone, that it was imputed to him.

quotes.text: Through faith also Sara herself received strength to conceive seed, and was delivered of a child when she was past age, because she judged him faithful who had promised.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Through faith also Sara herself received strength to conceive seed, and was delivered of a child when she was past age, because she judged him faithful who had promised.

quotes.text: He that is of a proud heart stirreth up strife: but he that putteth his trust in the Lord shall be made fat.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: He that is of a proud heart stirreth up strife: but he that putteth his trust in the Lord shall be made fat.

quotes.text: But for us also, to whom it shall be imputed, if we believe on him that raised up Jesus our Lord from the dead.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: But for us also, to whom it shall be imputed, if we believe on him that raised up Jesus our Lord from the dead.

quotes.text: For evildoers shall be cut off: but those that wait upon the Lord, they shall inherit the earth.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For evildoers shall be cut off: but those that wait upon the Lord, they shall inherit the earth.

quotes.text: Therefore sprang there even of one, and him as good as dead, so many as the stars of the sky in multitude, and as the sand which is by the sea shore innumerable.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Therefore sprang there even of one, and him as good as dead, so many as the stars of the sky in multitude, and as the sand which is by the sea shore innumerable.

quotes.text: Every word of God is pure: he is a shield unto them that put their trust in him.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Every word of God is pure: he is a shield unto them that put their trust in him.

quotes.text: Who was delivered for our offences, and was raised again for our justification.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Who was delivered for our offences, and was raised again for our justification.

quotes.text: If any of you lack wisdom, let him ask of God, that giveth to all men liberally, and upbraideth not; and it shall be given him.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: If any of you lack wisdom, let him ask of God, that giveth to all men liberally, and upbraideth not; and it shall be given him.

quotes.text: I will instruct thee and teach thee in the way which thou shalt go: I will guide thee with mine eye.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: I will instruct thee and teach thee in the way which thou shalt go: I will guide thee with mine eye.

quotes.text: A man's heart deviseth his way: but the Lord directeth his steps.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: A man's heart deviseth his way: but the Lord directeth his steps.

quotes.text: And thine ears shall hear a word behind thee, saying, This is the way, walk ye in it, when ye turn to the right hand, and when ye turn to the left.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And thine ears shall hear a word behind thee, saying, This is the way, walk ye in it, when ye turn to the right hand, and when ye turn to the left.

quotes.text: The meek will he guide in judgment: and the meek will he teach his way.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: The meek will he guide in judgment: and the meek will he teach his way.

quotes.text: For the Lord giveth wisdom: out of his mouth cometh knowledge and understanding.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For the Lord giveth wisdom: out of his mouth cometh knowledge and understanding.

quotes.text: Thy word is a lamp unto my feet, and a light unto my path.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Thy word is a lamp unto my feet, and a light unto my path.

quotes.text: Call unto me, and I will answer thee, and show thee great and mighty things, which thou knowest not.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Call unto me, and I will answer thee, and show thee great and mighty things, which thou knowest not.

quotes.text: The fear of the Lord is the beginning of knowledge: but fools despise wisdom and instruction.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: The fear of the Lord is the beginning of knowledge: but fools despise wisdom and instruction.

quotes.text: Show me thy ways, O Lord; teach me thy paths.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Show me thy ways, O Lord; teach me thy paths.

quotes.text: Wisdom is the principal thing; therefore get wisdom: and with all thy getting get understanding.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Wisdom is the principal thing; therefore get wisdom: and with all thy getting get understanding.

quotes.text: Lead me in thy truth, and teach me: for thou art the God of my salvation; on thee do I wait all the day.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Lead me in thy truth, and teach me: for thou art the God of my salvation; on thee do I wait all the day.

quotes.text: For wisdom is better than rubies; and all the things that may be desired are not to be compared to it.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For wisdom is better than rubies; and all the things that may be desired are not to be compared to it.

quotes.text: Good and upright is the Lord: therefore will he teach sinners in the way.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Good and upright is the Lord: therefore will he teach sinners in the way.

quotes.text: The fear of the Lord is the beginning of wisdom: and the knowledge of the holy is understanding.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: The fear of the Lord is the beginning of wisdom: and the knowledge of the holy is understanding.

quotes.text: When pride cometh, then cometh shame: but with the lowly is wisdom.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: When pride cometh, then cometh shame: but with the lowly is wisdom.

quotes.text: What man is he that feareth the Lord? him shall he teach in the way that he shall choose.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: What man is he that feareth the Lord? him shall he teach in the way that he shall choose.

quotes.text: The way of a fool is right in his own eyes: but he that hearkeneth unto counsel is wise.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: The way of a fool is right in his own eyes: but he that hearkeneth unto counsel is wise.

quotes.text: The secret of the Lord is with them that fear him; and he will show them his covenant.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: The secret of the Lord is with them that fear him; and he will show them his covenant.

quotes.text: Only by pride cometh contention: but with the well advised is wisdom.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Only by pride cometh contention: but with the well advised is wisdom.

quotes.text: The wisdom of the prudent is to understand his way: but the folly of fools is deceit.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: The wisdom of the prudent is to understand his way: but the folly of fools is deceit.

quotes.text: Without counsel purposes are disappointed: but in the multitude of counsellors they are established.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Without counsel purposes are disappointed: but in the multitude of counsellors they are established.

quotes.text: For this God is our God for ever and ever: he will be our guide even unto death.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For this God is our God for ever and ever: he will be our guide even unto death.

quotes.text: Commit thy works unto the Lord, and thy thoughts shall be established.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Commit thy works unto the Lord, and thy thoughts shall be established.

quotes.text: Thou shalt guide me with thy counsel, and afterward receive me to glory.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Thou shalt guide me with thy counsel, and afterward receive me to glory.

quotes.text: The entrance of thy words giveth light; it giveth understanding unto the simple.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: The entrance of thy words giveth light; it giveth understanding unto the simple.

quotes.text: Wisdom is before him that hath understanding; but the eyes of a fool are in the ends of the earth.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Wisdom is before him that hath understanding; but the eyes of a fool are in the ends of the earth.

quotes.text: Order my steps in thy word: and let not any iniquity have dominion over me.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Order my steps in thy word: and let not any iniquity have dominion over me.

quotes.text: Hear counsel, and receive instruction, that thou mayest be wise in thy latter end.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Hear counsel, and receive instruction, that thou mayest be wise in thy latter end.

quotes.text: Let my cry come near before thee, O Lord: give me understanding according to thy word.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Let my cry come near before thee, O Lord: give me understanding according to thy word.

quotes.text: Every purpose is established by counsel: and with good advice make war.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Every purpose is established by counsel: and with good advice make war.

quotes.text: Cause me to hear thy lovingkindness in the morning; for in thee do I trust: cause me to know the way wherein I should walk; for I lift up my soul unto thee.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Cause me to hear thy lovingkindness in the morning; for in thee do I trust: cause me to know the way wherein I should walk; for I lift up my soul unto thee.

quotes.text: There is no wisdom nor understanding nor counsel against the Lord.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: There is no wisdom nor understanding nor counsel against the Lord.

quotes.text: Teach me to do thy will; for thou art my God: thy spirit is good; lead me into the land of uprightness.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Teach me to do thy will; for thou art my God: thy spirit is good; lead me into the land of uprightness.

quotes.text: Train up a child in the way he should go: and when he is old, he will not depart from it.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Train up a child in the way he should go: and when he is old, he will not depart from it.

quotes.text: For I will restore health unto thee, and I will heal thee of thy wounds, saith the Lord.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For I will restore health unto thee, and I will heal thee of thy wounds, saith the Lord.

quotes.text: Who forgiveth all thine iniquities; who healeth all thy diseases.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Who forgiveth all thine iniquities; who healeth all thy diseases.

quotes.text: But he was wounded for our transgressions, he was bruised for our iniquities: the chastisement of our peace was upon him; and with his stripes we are healed.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: But he was wounded for our transgressions, he was bruised for our iniquities: the chastisement of our peace was upon him; and with his stripes we are healed.

quotes.text: He healeth the broken in heart, and bindeth up their wounds.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: He healeth the broken in heart, and bindeth up their wounds.

quotes.text: O Lord my God, I cried unto thee, and thou hast healed me.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: O Lord my God, I cried unto thee, and thou hast healed me.

quotes.text: I have seen his ways, and will heal him: I will lead him also, and restore comforts unto him and to his mourners.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: I have seen his ways, and will heal him: I will lead him also, and restore comforts unto him and to his mourners.

quotes.text: The Lord will strengthen him upon the bed of languishing: thou wilt make all his bed in his sickness.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: The Lord will strengthen him upon the bed of languishing: thou wilt make all his bed in his sickness.

quotes.text: Heal me, O Lord, and I shall be healed; save me, and I shall be saved: for thou art my praise.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Heal me, O Lord, and I shall be healed; save me, and I shall be saved: for thou art my praise.

quotes.text: He sent his word, and healed them, and delivered them from their destructions.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: He sent his word, and healed them, and delivered them from their destructions.

quotes.text: Then shall thy light break forth as the morning, and thine health shall spring forth speedily: and thy righteousness shall go before thee; the glory of the Lord shall be thy rereward.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Then shall thy light break forth as the morning, and thine health shall spring forth speedily: and thy righteousness shall go before thee; the glory of the Lord shall be thy rereward.

quotes.text: Have mercy upon me, O Lord; for I am weak: O Lord, heal me; for my bones are vexed.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Have mercy upon me, O Lord; for I am weak: O Lord, heal me; for my bones are vexed.

quotes.text: Behold, I will bring it health and cure, and I will cure them, and will reveal unto them the abundance of peace and truth.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Behold, I will bring it health and cure, and I will cure them, and will reveal unto them the abundance of peace and truth.

quotes.text: Thou hast turned for me my mourning into dancing: thou hast put off my sackcloth, and girded me with gladness.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Thou hast turned for me my mourning into dancing: thou hast put off my sackcloth, and girded me with gladness.

quotes.text: The sacrifices of God are a broken spirit: a broken and a contrite heart, O God, thou wilt not despise.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: The sacrifices of God are a broken spirit: a broken and a contrite heart, O God, thou wilt not despise.

quotes.text: My flesh and my heart faileth: but God is the strength of my heart, and my portion for ever.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: My flesh and my heart faileth: but God is the strength of my heart, and my portion for ever.

quotes.text: Bless the Lord, O my soul, and forget not all his benefits.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Bless the Lord, O my soul, and forget not all his benefits.

quotes.text: If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins, and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins, and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.

quotes.text: As far as the east is from the west, so far hath he removed our transgressions from us.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: As far as the east is from the west, so far hath he removed our transgressions from us.

quotes.text: Blessed is he whose transgression is forgiven, whose sin is covered.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Blessed is he whose transgression is forgiven, whose sin is covered.

quotes.text: Forbearing one another, and forgiving one another, if any man have a quarrel against any: even as Christ forgave you, so also do ye.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Forbearing one another, and forgiving one another, if any man have a quarrel against any: even as Christ forgave you, so also do ye.

quotes.text: Have mercy upon me, O God, according to thy lovingkindness: according unto the multitude of thy tender mercies blot out my transgressions.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Have mercy upon me, O God, according to thy lovingkindness: according unto the multitude of thy tender mercies blot out my transgressions.

quotes.text: For if ye forgive men their trespasses, your heavenly Father will also forgive you.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For if ye forgive men their trespasses, your heavenly Father will also forgive you.

quotes.text: For thou, Lord, art good, and ready to forgive; and plenteous in mercy unto all them that call upon thee.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For thou, Lord, art good, and ready to forgive; and plenteous in mercy unto all them that call upon thee.

quotes.text: Judge not, and ye shall not be judged: condemn not, and ye shall not be condemned: forgive, and ye shall be forgiven.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Judge not, and ye shall not be judged: condemn not, and ye shall not be condemned: forgive, and ye shall be forgiven.

quotes.text: The Lord is merciful and gracious, slow to anger, and plenteous in mercy.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: The Lord is merciful and gracious, slow to anger, and plenteous in mercy.

quotes.text: And when ye stand praying, forgive, if ye have ought against any: that your Father also which is in heaven may forgive you your trespasses.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And when ye stand praying, forgive, if ye have ought against any: that your Father also which is in heaven may forgive you your trespasses.

quotes.text: He hath not dealt with us after our sins; nor rewarded us according to our iniquities.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: He hath not dealt with us after our sins; nor rewarded us according to our iniquities.

quotes.text: Then came Peter to him, and said, Lord, how oft shall my brother sin against me, and I forgive him? till seven times?
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Then came Peter to him, and said, Lord, how oft shall my brother sin against me, and I forgive him? till seven times?

quotes.text: For as the heaven is high above the earth, so great is his mercy toward them that fear him.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For as the heaven is high above the earth, so great is his mercy toward them that fear him.

quotes.text: Jesus saith unto him, I say not unto thee, Until seven times: but, Until seventy times seven.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Jesus saith unto him, I say not unto thee, Until seven times: but, Until seventy times seven.

quotes.text: Like as a father pitieth his children, so the Lord pitieth them that fear him.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Like as a father pitieth his children, so the Lord pitieth them that fear him.

quotes.text: Then said Jesus, Father, forgive them; for they know not what they do. And they parted his raiment, and cast lots.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Then said Jesus, Father, forgive them; for they know not what they do. And they parted his raiment, and cast lots.

quotes.text: For he knoweth our frame; he remembereth that we are dust.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For he knoweth our frame; he remembereth that we are dust.

quotes.text: Repent ye therefore, and be converted, that your sins may be blotted out, when the times of refreshing shall come from the presence of the Lord.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Repent ye therefore, and be converted, that your sins may be blotted out, when the times of refreshing shall come from the presence of the Lord.

quotes.text: As for man, his days are as grass: as a flower of the field, so he flourisheth.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: As for man, his days are as grass: as a flower of the field, so he flourisheth.

quotes.text: Saying, Blessed are they whose iniquities are forgiven, and whose sins are covered.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Saying, Blessed are they whose iniquities are forgiven, and whose sins are covered.

quotes.text: For the wind passeth over it, and it is gone; and the place thereof shall know it no more.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For the wind passeth over it, and it is gone; and the place thereof shall know it no more.

quotes.text: Therefore if any man be in Christ, he is a new creature: old things are passed away; behold, all things are become new.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Therefore if any man be in Christ, he is a new creature: old things are passed away; behold, all things are become new.

quotes.text: But the mercy of the Lord is from everlasting to everlasting upon them that fear him, and his righteousness unto children's children.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: But the mercy of the Lord is from everlasting to everlasting upon them that fear him, and his righteousness unto children's children.

quotes.text: For I will be merciful to their unrighteousness, and their sins and their iniquities will I remember no more.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For I will be merciful to their unrighteousness, and their sins and their iniquities will I remember no more.

quotes.text: To such as keep his covenant, and to those that remember his commandments to do them.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: To such as keep his covenant, and to those that remember his commandments to do them.

quotes.text: Who is a God like unto thee, that pardoneth iniquity, and passeth by the transgression of the remnant of his heritage? he retaineth not his anger for ever, because he delighteth in mercy.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Who is a God like unto thee, that pardoneth iniquity, and passeth by the transgression of the remnant of his heritage? he retaineth not his anger for ever, because he delighteth in mercy.

quotes.text: The Lord hath prepared his throne in the heavens; and his kingdom ruleth over all.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: The Lord hath prepared his throne in the heavens; and his kingdom ruleth over all.

quotes.text: Come now, and let us reason together, saith the Lord: though your sins be as scarlet, they shall be as white as snow; though they be red like crimson, they shall be as wool.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Come now, and let us reason together, saith the Lord: though your sins be as scarlet, they shall be as white as snow; though they be red like crimson, they shall be as wool.

quotes.text: Bless the Lord, ye his angels, that excel in strength, that do his commandments, hearkening unto the voice of his word.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Bless the Lord, ye his angels, that excel in strength, that do his commandments, hearkening unto the voice of his word.

quotes.text: And all things, whatsoever ye shall ask in prayer, believing, ye shall receive.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And all things, whatsoever ye shall ask in prayer, believing, ye shall receive.

quotes.text: Pray without ceasing.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Pray without ceasing.

quotes.text: Be careful for nothing; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Be careful for nothing; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God.

quotes.text: Therefore I say unto you, What things soever ye desire, when ye pray, believe that ye receive them, and ye shall have them.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Therefore I say unto you, What things soever ye desire, when ye pray, believe that ye receive them, and ye shall have them.

quotes.text: The Lord is nigh unto all them that call upon him, to all that call upon him in truth.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: The Lord is nigh unto all them that call upon him, to all that call upon him in truth.

quotes.text: Then shall ye call upon me, and ye shall go and pray unto me, and I will hearken unto you.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Then shall ye call upon me, and ye shall go and pray unto me, and I will hearken unto you.

quotes.text: Blessed be God, which hath not turned away my prayer, nor his mercy from me.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Blessed be God, which hath not turned away my prayer, nor his mercy from me.

quotes.text: And this is the confidence that we have in him, that, if we ask any thing according to his will, he heareth us.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And this is the confidence that we have in him, that, if we ask any thing according to his will, he heareth us.

quotes.text: I have called upon thee, for thou wilt hear me, O God: incline thine ear unto me, and hear my speech.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: I have called upon thee, for thou wilt hear me, O God: incline thine ear unto me, and hear my speech.

quotes.text: And I say unto you, Ask, and it shall be given you; seek, and ye shall find; knock, and it shall be opened unto you.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And I say unto you, Ask, and it shall be given you; seek, and ye shall find; knock, and it shall be opened unto you.

quotes.text: The righteous cry, and the Lord heareth, and delivereth them out of all their troubles.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: The righteous cry, and the Lord heareth, and delivereth them out of all their troubles.

quotes.text: But thou, when thou prayest, enter into thy closet, and when thou hast shut thy door, pray to thy Father which is in secret; and thy Father which seeth in secret shall reward thee openly.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: But thou, when thou prayest, enter into thy closet, and when thou hast shut thy door, pray to thy Father which is in secret; and thy Father which seeth in secret shall reward thee openly.

quotes.text: Evening, and morning, and at noon, will I pray, and cry aloud: and he shall hear my voice.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Evening, and morning, and at noon, will I pray, and cry aloud: and he shall hear my voice.

quotes.text: Ask, and it shall be given you; seek, and ye shall find; knock, and it shall be opened unto you.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Ask, and it shall be given you; seek, and ye shall find; knock, and it shall be opened unto you.

quotes.text: Give ear, O Lord, unto my prayer; and attend to the voice of my supplications.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Give ear, O Lord, unto my prayer; and attend to the voice of my supplications.

quotes.text: For every one that asketh receiveth; and he that seeketh findeth; and to him that knocketh it shall be opened.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For every one that asketh receiveth; and he that seeketh findeth; and to him that knocketh it shall be opened.

quotes.text: But unto thee have I cried, O Lord; and in the morning shall my prayer prevent thee.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: But unto thee have I cried, O Lord; and in the morning shall my prayer prevent thee.

quotes.text: Again I say unto you, That if two of you shall agree on earth as touching any thing that they shall ask, it shall be done for them of my Father which is in heaven.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Again I say unto you, That if two of you shall agree on earth as touching any thing that they shall ask, it shall be done for them of my Father which is in heaven.

quotes.text: He will regard the prayer of the destitute, and not despise their prayer.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: He will regard the prayer of the destitute, and not despise their prayer.

quotes.text: For where two or three are gathered together in my name, there am I in the midst of them.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For where two or three are gathered together in my name, there am I in the midst of them.

quotes.text: For my love they are my adversaries: but I give myself unto prayer.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For my love they are my adversaries: but I give myself unto prayer.

quotes.text: Watch and pray, that ye enter not into temptation: the spirit indeed is willing, but the flesh is weak.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Watch and pray, that ye enter not into temptation: the spirit indeed is willing, but the flesh is weak.

quotes.text: Let my prayer be set forth before thee as incense; and the lifting up of my hands as the evening sacrifice.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Let my prayer be set forth before thee as incense; and the lifting up of my hands as the evening sacrifice.

quotes.text: And in the morning, rising up a great while before day, he went out, and departed into a solitary place, and there prayed.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And in the morning, rising up a great while before day, he went out, and departed into a solitary place, and there prayed.

quotes.text: Hear my prayer, O Lord, give ear to my supplications: in thy faithfulness answer me, and in thy righteousness.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Hear my prayer, O Lord, give ear to my supplications: in thy faithfulness answer me, and in thy righteousness.

quotes.text: And he withdrew himself into the wilderness, and prayed.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And he withdrew himself into the wilderness, and prayed.

quotes.text: He will fulfil the desire of them that fear him: he also will hear their cry, and will save them.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: He will fulfil the desire of them that fear him: he also will hear their cry, and will save them.

quotes.text: And it came to pass in those days, that he went out into a mountain to pray, and continued all night in prayer to God.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And it came to pass in those days, that he went out into a mountain to pray, and continued all night in prayer to God.

quotes.text: Praise ye the Lord: for it is good to sing praises unto our God; for it is pleasant; and praise is comely.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Praise ye the Lord: for it is good to sing praises unto our God; for it is pleasant; and praise is comely.

quotes.text: And it came to pass about an eight days after these sayings, he took Peter and John and James, and went up into a mountain to pray.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And it came to pass about an eight days after these sayings, he took Peter and John and James, and went up into a mountain to pray.

quotes.text: I have taught thee in the way of wisdom; I have led thee in right paths.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: I have taught thee in the way of wisdom; I have led thee in right paths.

quotes.text: I lead in the way of righteousness, in the midst of the paths of judgment.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: I lead in the way of righteousness, in the midst of the paths of judgment.

quotes.text: The integrity of the upright shall guide them: but the perverseness of transgressors shall destroy them.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: The integrity of the upright shall guide them: but the perverseness of transgressors shall destroy them.

quotes.text: Righteousness keepeth him that is upright in the way: but wickedness overthroweth the sinner.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Righteousness keepeth him that is upright in the way: but wickedness overthroweth the sinner.

quotes.text: There is a way which seemeth right unto a man, but the end thereof are the ways of death.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: There is a way which seemeth right unto a man, but the end thereof are the ways of death.

quotes.text: The way of the slothful man is as an hedge of thorns: but the way of the righteous is made plain.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: The way of the slothful man is as an hedge of thorns: but the way of the righteous is made plain.

quotes.text: Surely he shall deliver thee from the snare of the fowler, and from the noisome pestilence.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Surely he shall deliver thee from the snare of the fowler, and from the noisome pestilence.

quotes.text: Thou shalt not be afraid for the terror by night; nor for the arrow that flieth by day.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Thou shalt not be afraid for the terror by night; nor for the arrow that flieth by day.

quotes.text: Nor for the pestilence that walketh in darkness; nor for the destruction that wasteth at noonday.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Nor for the pestilence that walketh in darkness; nor for the destruction that wasteth at noonday.

quotes.text: A thousand shall fall at thy side, and ten thousand at thy right hand; but it shall not come nigh thee.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: A thousand shall fall at thy side, and ten thousand at thy right hand; but it shall not come nigh thee.

quotes.text: Only with thine eyes shalt thou behold and see the reward of the wicked.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Only with thine eyes shalt thou behold and see the reward of the wicked.

quotes.text: Because thou hast made the Lord, which is my refuge, even the most High, thy habitation.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Because thou hast made the Lord, which is my refuge, even the most High, thy habitation.

quotes.text: There shall no evil befall thee, neither shall any plague come nigh thy dwelling.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: There shall no evil befall thee, neither shall any plague come nigh thy dwelling.

quotes.text: For he shall give his angels charge over thee, to keep thee in all thy ways.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For he shall give his angels charge over thee, to keep thee in all thy ways.

quotes.text: They shall bear thee up in their hands, lest thou dash thy foot against a stone.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: They shall bear thee up in their hands, lest thou dash thy foot against a stone.

quotes.text: Thou shalt tread upon the lion and adder: the young lion and the dragon shalt thou trample under feet.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Thou shalt tread upon the lion and adder: the young lion and the dragon shalt thou trample under feet.

quotes.text: Because he hath set his love upon me, therefore will I deliver him: I will set him on high, because he hath known my name.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Because he hath set his love upon me, therefore will I deliver him: I will set him on high, because he hath known my name.

quotes.text: He shall call upon me, and I will answer him: I will be with him in trouble; I will deliver him, and honour him.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: He shall call upon me, and I will answer him: I will be with him in trouble; I will deliver him, and honour him.

quotes.text: With long life will I satisfy him, and show him my salvation.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: With long life will I satisfy him, and show him my salvation.
